actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 141 of title 10, United States Code, to require that the Secretaries of the military departments be kept fully and currently informed regarding all matters considered and acted upon by the Joint Chiefs of Staff.

summary.text: Requires that the Secretaries of the military departments in the Department of Defense be kept fully and currently informed regarding all matters considered and acted upon by the Joint Chiefs of Staff. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 141)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 141 of title 10, United States Code, to require that the Secretaries of the military departments be kept fully and currently informed regarding all matters considered and acted upon by the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
